segments.text: My eyes keep drifting back to that boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched so far, reaching into that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it could go at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those splayed legs are barely holding him up, it's terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can practically feel the wobble from here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is right there, completely oblivious to the danger too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She just wants her cookie, her focus entirely on the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a perilous situation for a few sweet treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself or break that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him tumbling onto that wet floor makes my stomach clench.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman has no idea, still polishing her dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a recipe for an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The precariousness of it all is truly unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR
